0.5.name: wordpress/wordpress-friendfeed-comments
0.5.description: This plugin automatically finds your wordpress blog posts that comes from your rss feed on FriendFeed, and shows all received FriendFeed comments under comments section of your blog posts. It allows you to show FriendFeed comments & 'likes' in your blog
